name: SokoChess Black
description:
What is SokoChess Black?

SokoChess Black is a unique chess puzzle game in which you must use your wits to navigate each level, moving, pushing and capturing white pieces until there are none left.

Capture the white pieces


The goal of each level is to capture all the white pieces.

Move and push your own pieces


You can move your own pieces but also push them to make them move in a way they normally couldn't.

Beyond Chess


Overcome many unique obstacles before unseen in Chess!



  • 70 handcrafted levels
  • Infinite undos
  • Puzzle elements you won't see in Chess
  • Don't like a level you are playing? Skip it!
  • Unique gameplay combining Chess and Sokoban

Experience Chess like never before!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2482820/SokoChess_Black/
